<h1 id="大乐透中奖概率分析-">大乐透中奖概率分析 🎰</h1>
<h2 id="-前言">📚 前言</h2>
<p>大乐透由前区35选5和后区12选2组成。本文将从数学角度分析各个奖级的中奖概率。</p>
<h2 id="-符号说明">🔣 符号说明</h2>
<ul>
<li><span class="math inline">\(C_n^m\)</span> 表示从n个数中取m个数的组合数</li>
<li>前区: 35选5</li>
<li>后区: 12选2</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="-各奖级中奖概率计算">💫 各奖级中奖概率计算</h2>
<h3 id="-一等奖">🏆 一等奖</h3>
<p><strong>要求</strong>: 前区5个号码全中 + 后区2个号码全中</p>
<p><strong>概率计算</strong>:<br>
<span class="math inline">\(P_{一等奖} = \frac{C_5^5 \times C_2^2}{C_{35}^5 \times C_{12}^2}\)</span></p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(= \frac{1 \times 1}{324632 \times 66}\)</span></p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(= \frac{1}{21425712}\)</span> ≈ 0.0000000467</p>
<h3 id="二等奖">二等奖</h3>
<p>要求: 前区5个号码全中 + 后区中1个</p>
<p>概率计算:<br>
<span class="math inline">\(P_{二等奖} = \frac{C_5^5 \times C_2^1 \times C_{10}^1}{C_{35}^5 \times C_{12}^2}\)</span></p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(= \frac{1 \times 2 \times 10}{324632 \times 66}\)</span></p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(= \frac{20}{21425712}\)</span> ≈ 0.00000093</p>
<h3 id="三等奖">三等奖</h3>
<p>要求: 前区5个号码全中 + 后区0个 或 前区4个号码 + 后区2个全中</p>
<p>概率计算:<br>
<span class="math inline">\(P_{三等奖} = \frac{C_5^5 \times C_2^0 \times C_{10}^2}{C_{35}^5 \times C_{12}^2} + \frac{C_5^4 \times C_{30}^1 \times C_2^2}{C_{35}^5 \times C_{12}^2}\)</span></p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(= \frac{1 \times 1}{324632 \times 66} + \frac{5 \times 30 \times 66}{324632 \times 66}\)</span></p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(= \frac{1}{21425712} + \frac{990}{21425712}\)</span></p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(= \frac{991}{21425712}\)</span> ≈ 0.0000462</p>
<h3 id="四等奖">四等奖</h3>
<p>要求: 前区4个号码 + 后区1个 或 前区3个号码 + 后区2个全中</p>
<p>概率计算:<br>
<span class="math inline">\(P_{四等奖} = \frac{C_5^4 \times C_{30}^1 \times C_2^1 \times C_{10}^1}{C_{35}^5 \times C_{12}^2} + \frac{C_5^3 \times C_{30}^2 \times C_2^2}{C_{35}^5 \times C_{12}^2}\)</span></p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(= \frac{5 \times 30 \times 2 \times 10}{324632 \times 66} + \frac{10 \times 435 \times 66}{324632 \times 66}\)</span></p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(= \frac{300}{21425712} + \frac{4350}{21425712}\)</span></p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(= \frac{4650}{21425712}\)</span> ≈ 0.000217</p>
<h3 id="五等奖">五等奖</h3>
<p>要求: 前区4个号码 + 后区0个 或 前区3个号码 + 后区1个 或 前区2个号码 + 后区2个全中</p>
<p>概率计算:<br>
<span class="math inline">\(P_{五等奖} = \frac{C_5^4 \times C_{30}^1 \times C_2^0 \times C_{10}^2}{C_{35}^5 \times C_{12}^2} + \frac{C_5^3 \times C_{30}^2 \times C_2^1 \times C_{10}^1}{C_{35}^5 \times C_{12}^2} + \frac{C_5^2 \times C_{30}^3 \times C_2^2}{C_{35}^5 \times C_{12}^2}\)</span></p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(= \frac{5 \times 30 \times 1 \times 45}{324632 \times 66} + \frac{10 \times 435 \times 2 \times 10}{324632 \times 66} + \frac{15 \times 406 \times 66}{324632 \times 66}\)</span></p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(= \frac{675}{21425712} + \frac{8700}{21425712} + \frac{6090}{21425712}\)</span></p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(= \frac{114465}{21425712}\)</span> ≈ 0.00534</p>
<h2 id="-完全覆盖成本分析">💰 完全覆盖成本分析</h2>
<h3 id="-序列总数计算">📊 序列总数计算</h3>
<p>前区从35个号码中选择5个，后区从12个号码中选择2个，总共的组合数为：</p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(总组合数 = C_{35}^5 \times C_{12}^2 = 21425712\)</span> 注</p>
<h3 id="-购买成本">💵 购买成本</h3>
<p>每注大乐透单价为2元，则完全覆盖所有可能性需要：</p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(总成本 = 21425712 \times 2 = 42851424\)</span> 元</p>
<h3 id="️-时间成本">⏱️ 时间成本</h3>

<ul>
<li>每秒可以完成1注投注</li>
<li>每天连续工作8小时</li>
<li>不考虑休息时间</li>
</ul>
